name: Squeak (JasperConley)
description:
Squeak! In this 2D platformer, you fling a slimy blob and bounce off walls to get through levels!

This game was made for AIE Seattle's 2022 Winter Gam Jam!

____________________________________________________

Team Snowman!

Art

  • Max Birkeland
  • Aden Kemp
  • Bella Westrom
  • Jake Unabia

Programming 

  • Jeff Simon
  • Grant Rhoades

Design

  • Jasper Conley
  • Aidan Neumann

------------------------------------------------------ 

Controls:

  • Drag the mouse and pull back on the slime to fling it!
  • Push "R" to restart the level

** HEADPHONES RECOMENDED! **

------------------------------------------------------

Install instructions

To  play,  download the most recent ZIP folder. Once downloaded, extract the folder and you will see the contents of the game. 

Thank you for Playing!
